definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

pinyin: xiao3 er2 ma2 bi4 bing4 du2

definition: palsy/trembling paralysis/used for Parkinson's disease 帕金森病[Pa4 jin1 sen1 bing4]

sentences.english: Objective To study the surgical method and effect of nerve paralysis esotropia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨神经麻痹性内斜视的手术治疗方法与效果。

sentences.english: He is now quadriplegic and confined to a wheelchair.
sentences.chinese: 现在的他四肢麻痹，只能呆在轮椅上。

sentences.english: The domestic report botulism causes to breathe the myoparalysis case of illness to be less.
sentences.chinese: 国内报道肉毒中毒导致呼吸肌麻痹的病例较少。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the curative effect of Liyan Ice Bar on bulbar paralysis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察利咽冰棒配合针刺治疗球麻痹的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Among the patients with complete oculomotor nerve paralysis, no pupillary change appeared.
sentences.chinese: 完全性动眼神经麻痹者无瞳孔改变。

sentences.english: The refractive status showed hyperopic shift after cycloplegia .
sentences.chinese: 睫状肌麻痹后之屈光状态显示偏向远视。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the causes and risk factors of ophthalmoplegia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨眼肌麻痹的内科性病因及主要危险因素。

sentences.english: Sometimes, though, the paralysispersists even after the person wakes up.
sentences.chinese: 然而，有时，这种麻痹甚至持续到醒来。

sentences.english: It is accompanied with possible shock, paralysis, and tissue death.
sentences.chinese: 且同时伴随着颤栗，麻痹，组织死亡等。

sentences.english: Algetic ophthalmoplegia manifested the enlargement of cavernous sinus and enhancement of oculomotor nerve.
sentences.chinese: 痛性眼肌麻痹表现为海绵窦增大和动眼神经强化。

sentences.english: Conclusions The nervous anastomosis of the recurrent laryngeal nerve is effective for the treatment of laryngeal abductor paralysis.
sentences.chinese: 结论喉返神经吻合术能有效治疗喉外展麻痹。

sentences.english: There was no hypoparathyroidism and recurrent nerve paralysis in this group.
sentences.chinese: 术后无永久性甲状旁腺功能减退和喉返神经麻痹。

sentences.english: Conclusion Liyan Ice Bar has a sure curative effect on bulbar paralysis.
sentences.chinese: 结论利咽冰棒配合针刺治疗球麻痹疗效确切。

sentences.english: The most common injury is brachial plexus palsy, often caused by shoulder dystocia.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的产伤是臂麻痹，通常因肩难产引起。

sentences.english: We can't get unwary just because nothing unusual has cropped up.
sentences.chinese: 不能因为没发生什么问题就麻痹大意起来。

sentences.english: Paralytic (shellfish) poisonings are one of the main red tide toxins.
sentences.chinese: 麻痹性贝毒素是其中重要的一类赤潮藻毒素。

definition: vertigo/dizziness/fainting/feeling of swaying, head spinning, lack of balance or floating (e.g. from a stroke)/Taiwan pr. [xuan4 yun1]
slow in one's reactions/sluggish (in movement or thought)
